Featured course
Photo by Jambo International

Mitsumine

Tanzawa, Kanagawa

by Leszek
chains onsen

Mount Mitsumine in Tanzawa offers an untamed hiking course, marked by chains, ladders and, seasonally, various local fauna. Expect to spend quality time with the natural environment.

Hikr.jp is a growing collection of hiking courses in Japan. We are currently in open beta. If you'd like to contribute or report bugs, mistakes or say "GOOD JOB!", contact us.
